co.nayt.picnic

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.nayt.picnic.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskRunnable.TaskRunnableDownloadMethods

    class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskRunnable.TaskRunnableDownloadMethods
    This class manages the TaskRunnable object which downloads and decodes images. It implements the TaskRunnableDownloadMethods interface that the TaskRunnable defines to perform the action.

      • getCurrentThread

        java.lang.Thread getCurrentThread()
        Returns the Thread that this Task is running on. It uses a lock on the ThreadPool singleton to prevent thread interference.

      • initializeDownloaderTask

                              android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                              java.lang.String url,
                              int targetWidth,
                              int targetHeight)
        Initializes the Task
        Parameters:
        instance - A ThreadPool object
        imageView - An ImageView instance that shows the downloaded image
        targetWidth - The target width of the downloaded image
        targetHeight - The target height of the downloaded image

      • recycle

        void recycle()
        Recycles a Task object before it's put back into the pool. One reason to do this is to avoid memory leaks.
